assignments.description: Assign outputs from the Calculate Products/Services Ordered subflow.
assignments.name: Assign_Order_Calc_Outputs
assignments.label: Assign Order Calc Outputs

decisions.description: See if the contact2 link is missing
decisions.name: Copy_2_of_Is_Contact2_Contact_Missing
decisions.label: Copy 2 of Is Contact2 Contact Missing?

rules.name: Copy_2_of_YES_Contact2_Not_Created
rules.label: Copy 2 of YES - Contact2 Not Created

decisions.description: Determine if contact1 details change.
decisions.name: Did_Contact1_Change
decisions.label: Did Contact1 Change

rules.name: YES_Cont1_Mother_Change
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 7) AND 6
rules.label: YES - Cont1 Mother Change

rules.name: YES_Cont1_Non_Mother_Change
rules.conditionLogic: (1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5 or 7) AND 6
rules.label: YES - Cont1 Non-Mother Change

decisions.description: Determine if contact2 details change.
decisions.name: Did_Contact2_Change
decisions.label: Did Contact2 Change

decisions.description: Check to see if the email address changed.
decisions.name: Did_Email_Address_Change
decisions.label: Did Email Address Change?

decisions.description: Determine if the owner changed for the opp.
decisions.name: Did_Owner_Change
decisions.label: Did Owner Change

decisions.description: Check to see if the promo winner changed
decisions.name: Did_Promo_Winner_Change
decisions.label: Did Promo Winner Change

decisions.description: Determine if SMS Opt Out is Set
decisions.name: Did_SMS_Opt_Out
decisions.label: Did SMS Opt Out

decisions.description: Check to see if the email field equals dupe email
decisions.name: Does_Email_Equal_Dup_Email
decisions.label: Does Email Equal Dup Email

decisions.description: Determine if the opp/lead prefers email.
decisions.name: Does_Opp_Prefer_Email
decisions.label: Does Opp Prefer Email?

decisions.description: Determine if the Authorization ID has been set.
decisions.name: Is_Authorization_ID_Set
decisions.label: Is Authorization ID Set?

decisions.description: Determine if Change Owner to Americord is set.
decisions.name: Is_Change_Owner_Americord_Set
decisions.label: Is Change Owner Americord Set

decisions.description: See if the contact2 link is missing
decisions.name: Is_Contact2_Contact_Missing
decisions.label: Is Contact2 Contact Missing?

decisions.description: Determine if the contact is null.
decisions.name: Is_Contact_Null
decisions.label: Is Contact Null

rules.name: YES_Contact_Is_Null_and_ContactID_is_Null
rules.label: YES - Contact Is Null and ContactID is Null

rules.name: YES_Contact_is_Null_and_ContactID_Not_Null
rules.label: YES - Contact is Null and ContactID Not Null

decisions.description: Determine if the ecomm status field is set to enrolled.
decisions.name: Is_Ecomm_Status_Enrolled
decisions.label: Is Ecomm Status Enrolled

decisions.description: Determine if no mother is set on the opp and the contact fields changed.
decisions.name: Is_No_Mother_Set_On_Opp_and_Fields_Changed
decisions.label: Is No Mother Set On Opp and Fields Changed

rules.name: YES_No_mother_and_changed
rules.conditionLogic: 1 and 2 and (3 or 4 or 5 or 6 or 7)
rules.label: YES - No mother and changed

decisions.description: Determine if opportunity is closed.
decisions.name: Is_Opp_Closed
decisions.label: Is Opp Closed?

decisions.description: Determine if the delete flag has been set for the opp.
decisions.name: Is_Opp_Delete_Set
decisions.label: Is Opp Delete Set?

decisions.description: Check to see if the opportunity is enrolled. This will prevent the overwrite of values for Ordered.
decisions.name: Is_Opportunity_Enrolled
decisions.label: Is Opportunity Enrolled

decisions.description: Determine if opportunity is open/new.
decisions.name: Is_Opportunity_Open_New
decisions.label: Is Opportunity Open/New

rules.name: YES_Open_New_Due_Date_Null
rules.label: YES - Open - Due Date Null or Past

rules.name: YES_Open_Due_Date_In_Future
rules.label: YES - Open Due Date In Future

decisions.description: Determine if SMS Only Coreg Opp.
decisions.name: Is_SMS_Only_Coreg
decisions.label: Is SMS Only Coreg

Flow.description: Flow that will run after insert or update.

formulas.description: This formula will return either the baby due date or a future date.
formulas.name: formDTDueDateFutureDate

formulas.description: Formula that will set the promo winner checked datetime.
formulas.name: formDTPromoWinnerChecked

formulas.description: Formula for date that is 274 days in the future.
formulas.name: formDTTodayPlus274

formulas.description: Formula to set the Account name based on the opp.
formulas.name: formTAccountNameOnOppContact2Change

formulas.description: Formula for setting the account name when the Opp contact1 changes.
formulas.name: formTAccountNameOnOppContactChange

formulas.description: Formula that will set the Opportunity name based on if the due date is populated.
formulas.name: formTOpportunityName

formulas.description: Formula to set the opportunity name based on the opportunity contact values.
formulas.name: formTOpportunityNameContact2

Flow.label: RecordTrigger:Opportunity After Insert or Update
